oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hooks inducted into law hall of fame"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; law; National Bar Association; 1990s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Ten civil rights lawyers, law professors and judges were inducted into the National Bar Association's Hall of Fame Friday, including Memphian Benjamin Hooks who also received a special award from the Memphis & Shelby County Bar Foundation."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Buser, Lawrence
